data.message: When I view my friends profile video.. I find something very disturbing...  That I can push a button at top of the screen n connect or continue viewing..what's up wily with this???? Since this was done at my place of business does this mean he can turn it on and view me live??? I am so disturbed by this!!!! Please help

replies.message: Hi Michelle. It sounds like you after watching the profile video, you may have clicked on the profile picture where you then saw your friend's Stories. -Brittany
No... .  i saw a place in another screen it took me to....Where I could continuee viewing or connect...  Please advise
Thanks for clarifying, Michelle. It sounds like you were taken to a link outside of Facebook. -Brittany
Yes I'm sure of it.    What do I do now to make sure this is live web cam
